attributes.action: enforce the bigamy law as it stands in the U.K. to apply to all races and religions regardless of whether their country of origin allows them to have more than one wife and also we do not agree that a man with more than one wife should be allowed to claim benefit for each wife as this would be fraud.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
